title: Aikatsu on Parade!
title_japanese: アイカツオンパレード!
synopsis: Raki Kiseki is a second-year middle school student who transfers to Star Harmony Academy to become an idol. However, when she uses an Aikatsu Pass she received from her big sister (an Aikatsu engineer), something mysterious happens. Lots of doors appeared before her, and when she opens them, she meets Aikatsu idols she never knew before, such as Yume Nijino (Aikatsu Stars!). Raki vows to design her own premium dress and perform in it on stage. (Source: Anime News Network)
opening_themes: "Kimi no Entrance (君のEntrance)" by Raki Kiseki (Rin Aira), Aine Yuuki (Akane Matsunaga), Mio Minato (Ibuki Kido) from BEST FRIENDS!
ending_themes: #01: "Idol Katsudou! on Parade ver. (アイドル活動！オンパレード！ver.)" by Raki Kiseki (Rin Aira), Aine Yuuki (Akane Matsunaga), Mio Minato (Ibuki Kido) from BEST FRIENDS & Waka, Ruka, Sena (eps 1, 3, 6, 10, 13, 16, 18, 21-22, 25)
#02: "So Beautiful Story" by Ruka and Sena (ep 2)
#03: "Good morning my dream" by Ruka, Mona & Miki (ep 4)
#04: "Tutu Ballerina (チュチュ・バレリーナ)" by Ruka, Mona (Mona Tomoyama) & Miki (Miki Mirai) (ep 5)
#05: "Calendar Girl (カレンダーガール)" by Waka, Fuuri (Fuuri Uebana) & Sunao (Sunao Yoshikawa) (ep 7)
#06: "Original Star (オリジナルスター☆彡)" by Waka, Fuuri, Sunao, Remi (Remi Mitani), Moe (Moe YamazakI), Eri (Eri Aino), Yuna (Yuna Ichikura) & Risuko (Rsiuko Sasakama) (ep 8)
#08: "Alice Blue no Kiss ~Another Color~ (アリスブルーのキス～Another Color～)" by More Than True (Nao/Naoto Suzukawa [Toshiyuki Toyonaga]) (ep 11)
#10: "Pride (プライド)" by Karen (Azuki Tadokoro) & Mirai (Ayaka Ohashi) from BEST FRIENDS! (ep 14)
#11: "Hikari/Hitori/Kirari (ヒラリ／ヒトリ／キラリ)" by Waka, Fuuri, Sunao, Remi, Moe, Eri, Yuna & Risuko (ep 15)
#12: "Mori no Hkari no Pirouette (森のひかりのピルエット)" by Sena & Ruka (ep 17)
#13: "Be Star" by Hibiki (Youko Hikasa) from BEST FRIENDS! (ep 19)
#14: "Bon Bon Voyage!" by Risa (Risa Aizawa) & Miho (ep 20)
#15: "episode Solo" by Ruka, Nanase, Sena & Miho (ep 23)
#16: "Believe it" by Karen & Mirai from BEST FRIENDS! (ep 24)
